name: javascript-clone-detection
author: Lu√≠s Felipe Leal de Faria <felipelealdefaria@gmail.com> (https://github.com/felipelealdefaria)
description: Academic study project on duplication of Javascript code using AST syntactic analysis and machine learning

scripts.pre-push: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && yarn all-clones
scripts.all-clones: yarn clone-type-one && yarn clone-type-two && yarn clone-type-three && yarn clone-type-four && yarn clone-arrow-to-regular
